verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> I looked, <S%G3708><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> a door <S%G2374><s%> [standing] open <S%G455><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and the first <S%G4413><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I had heard, <S%G191><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> [the sound] of a trumpet <S%G4536><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> with me, said, <S%G3004><s%> "Come <S%G305><s%> up here, <S%G5602><s%> and I will show <S%G1166><s%> you what <S%G3739><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> take <S%G1096><s%> place <S%G1096><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things. <S%G3778><s%>"

Immediately <S%G2112><s%> I was in the Spirit; <S%G4151><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> a throne <S%G2362><s%> was standing <S%G2749><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and One sitting <S%G2521><s%> on the throne. <S%G2362><s%>

And He who was sitting <S%G2521><s%> [was] like <S%G3664><s%> a jasper <S%G2393><s%> stone <S%G3037><s%> and a sardius <S%G4556><s%> in appearance; <S%G3706><s%> and [there was] a rainbow <S%G2463><s%> around <S%G2943><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> an emerald <S%G4664><s%> in appearance. <S%G3706><s%>

And around <S%G2943><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> [were] twenty-four thrones; <S%G2362><s%> and upon the thrones <S%G2362><s%> [I saw] twenty-four elders <S%G4245><s%> sitting, <S%G2521><s%> clothed <S%G4016><s%> in white <S%G3022><s%> garments, <S%G2440><s%> and golden <S%G5552><s%> crowns <S%G4735><s%> on their heads. <S%G2776><s%>

And from the throne <S%G2362><s%> proceed <S%G1607><s%> flashes <S%G796><s%> of lightning <S%G796><s%> and sounds <S%G5456><s%> and peals <S%G1027><s%> of thunder. <S%G1027><s%> And [there were] seven <S%G2033><s%> lamps <S%G2985><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%> burning <S%G2545><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> are the seven <S%G2033><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

and before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> [there was,] as it were, a sea <S%G2281><s%> of glass <S%G5193><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> crystal; <S%G2930><s%> and in the center <S%G3319><s%> and around <S%G2945><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> living <S%G2226><s%> creatures <S%G2226><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of eyes <S%G3788><s%> in front <S%G1715><s%> and behind. <S%G3693><s%>

And the first <S%G4413><s%> creature <S%G2226><s%> [was] like <S%G3664><s%> a lion, <S%G3023><s%> and the second <S%G1208><s%> creature <S%G2226><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a calf, <S%G3448><s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> creature <S%G2226><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> a face <S%G4383><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> that of a man, <S%G444><s%> and the fourth <S%G5067><s%> creature <S%G2226><s%> [was] like <S%G3664><s%> a flying <S%G4072><s%> eagle. <S%G105><s%>

And the four <S%G5064><s%> living <S%G2226><s%> creatures, <S%G2226><s%> each <S%G2596><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of them having <S%G2192><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> wings, <S%G4420><s%> are full <S%G1073><s%> of eyes <S%G3788><s%> around <S%G2943><s%> and within; <S%G2081><s%> and day <S%G2250><s%> and night <S%G3571><s%> they do not cease <S%G372><s%> to say, <S%G3004><s%> "Holy, <S%G40><s%> holy, <S%G40><s%> holy, <S%G40><s%> [is] the Lord <S%G2962><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the Almighty, <S%G3841><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> was and who is and who is to come. <S%G2064><s%>"

And when <S%G3752><s%> the living <S%G2226><s%> creatures <S%G2226><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> and honor <S%G5092><s%> and thanks <S%G2169><s%> to Him who sits <S%G2521><s%> on the throne, <S%G2362><s%> to Him who lives <S%G2198><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever, <S%G165><s%>

the twenty-four elders <S%G4245><s%> will fall <S%G4098><s%> down <S%G4098><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> Him who sits <S%G2521><s%> on the throne, <S%G2362><s%> and will worship <S%G4352><s%> Him who lives <S%G2198><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever, <S%G165><s%> and will cast <S%G906><s%> their crowns <S%G4735><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

"Worthy <S%G514><s%> art <S%G1510><s%> Thou, our Lord <S%G2962><s%> and our God, <S%G2316><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> and honor <S%G5092><s%> and power; <S%G1411><s%> for Thou didst create <S%G2936><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> and because <S%G1223><s%> of Thy will <S%G2307><s%> they existed, <S%G1510><s%> and were created. <S%G2936><s%>"
